# OSIncrementAtomic64

**Function**

64-bit increment.

## Declaration

```swift
SInt64 OSIncrementAtomic64(volatile SInt64 *address);
```

## Discussion

See OSIncrementAtomic.

## Increment

- **OSIncrementAtomic**: 32-bit increment operation, performed atomically with respect to all devices that participate in the coherency architecture of the platform.
- **OSIncrementAtomic8**: 8-bit increment operation, performed atomically with respect to all devices that participate in the coherency architecture of the platform.
- **OSIncrementAtomic16**: 16-bit increment operation, performed atomically with respect to all devices that participate in the coherency architecture of the platform.
